items.sentence: Tom says he intends to play golf with us this afternoon.
Tom should have known better than to lend money to Mary.
Tom started taking boxing lessons when he turned twelve.
Tom started to speak, but then decided to remain silent.
Tom ordered a glass of orange juice and a cup of coffee.
Tom repainted his mailbox because it was looking shabby.
Tom asked Mary to give him a ride to the amusement park.
Tom put all his money in a box and hid it under his bed.
Tom started playing golf when he was thirteen years old.
Tom wanted to know who Mary planned to go swimming with.
